GroupPermissions.AddUserToGroup: Add a new member to this group
GroupPermissions.DeleteGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the group '%s'?
GroupPermissions.DescriptionAccessTab: Decide which groups have access to your websites. You can also give access to all the websites at once by choosing "Apply to all websites" in the website selector.
GroupPermissions.DescriptionGroupsTab: Here you can take a look at the members of each group. Superusers may edit the groups.

GroupPermissions.RenameGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to rename the group '%1$s' to '%2$s'?
